summary: This mod adds a beautiful male hireling to your game and also a preset of Dares. Just hire him for him to follow you like you would with any other hireling and you can also marry him.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7494076-1404074700.png [/img]
[img=center] http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7494076-1403190766.jpg [/img]

[center]ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_2 is needed for this file to work, which an be downloaded[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] here [/url] [/center]

Dares Maro is a new hireling/follower (Dares pronounced Dare-Ees). He can be found in The Bee and Barb in Riften. All you have to do is pay his fee and then he's all yours.

He has the voice of Stenvar and Farkas and is Imperial race.

You can do everything with him you can do with a normal hireling like put things in and out of their inventory. Dares has a Mark of Dibella in his inventory - wink wink. and some skooma, which he's supposed to sell but I couldn't get him to do that :(

Yes, he has the same surname as Commander Maro and Gaius Maro, that's because they're related.. OOH! I've set his relationships up so that Commander Maro is his father and Gaius is his brother. However Dares hates them both so if you want to do the Dark Brotherhood quest line he will have no problem fighting them.

This is my first mod so please let me know if you have any problems and I will try my best to solve them!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=yellow] INSTALL [/color]

Just click to download with NMM!
If for some reason that doesn't work, just download it manually.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=yellow] MODS USED [/color]

To make Dares look the same as he does in the pictures you may want to consider downloading these mods:
[list]
[*]Hair - ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_2 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
[*]Beards - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?
[*]Better Males - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?
[*]Smooth Faces - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1971/?
[*]Pretty Eyes - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3424/?
[/list]


Also if you want the red leather armor shown in the pictures then that is from Immersive Armors: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?

And for vampire Dares I used: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?
and http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21921/?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have added a preset file so that you can now play as Dares if you want to.


Thank you, and I hope you enjoy your new follower!

Lauren.

[img=center] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7494076-1404075026.png [/img]
author: laurenmag
